data.decision: Restructure Cinematch using atomic design principles with route groups, component library, and services layer
data.rationale: Current codebase has organic growth issues: root clutter (15+ test files), no component hierarchy, scattered screenshots (6 folders), missing services layer. Restructure improves maintainability, testability, and developer experience.
alternatives: Monorepo split into packages (overkill for current scale)
Keep current structure with documentation (doesn't solve root issues)
data.context: Duro autonomous experiment - testing compounded skills on real project restructure
